column4: Then guys, howcome it just says Connecting to my router and does nothing else? I entered the details and WPA code 100% right.. so what im i doing wrong :(

Because nobody is answering me Pici, i have asked it from the beginning :(
Well I dont know exactly, how do I find the model?
I opened my motherboard but couldn't find anything :(
open a terminal and type: lspci > ~/Desktop/results.txt
and then paste the contents of the results.txt file to paste.ubuntu-nl.org
it looks like that card uses the broadcom chipset, which may require you installing ndiswrapper... see https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/Driver/Ndiswrapper
Thanks, I will check that out :)
one more suggestion, search ubuntuforums for 'F5D7001' :)
It seems no one knows how to help you at this time. You might be better off starting to search ubuntuforums
